list.name: Default
list.comment:
Fixed painting to include the pygame.display.flip() necessary to show all changes to the screen after a paint.
Updated .gitignore

task.summary:
Added basic display class to support creating a pygame window, as well as support painting to the screen during each frame.
Added a lot of new feature support for logging, including: - RotatingFileHandler to limit file size to a configurable size (in kilobytes). - Configurable Regular Expression pattern filters to allow fine tuning of the log messages to show. - Add option to disable loggers in configuration file. - Add organization to event logging, categorizing by the name of the event the log message pertains too.
Phase out support of environment.py, as the project root is added to pythonpath by default in pycharm.
Add code to Engine class to keep track of a shared instance of the Engine class, and make all persistent variables class-level, so they are shared across instances.

Initial support for a widget display system.
Added flag around Engine event loop to ensure only one instance is running at a time.
Added documentation.

Added basic documentation for display module.
Added basic documentation for engine module, and changed log messages from debug level to info level.
Added basic documentation for environment module.
Start of implementation for PGEWidget and Layouts.

MESSAGE.value:
Added basic display class to support creating a pygame window, as well as support painting to the screen during each frame.
Added a lot of new feature support for logging, including: - RotatingFileHandler to limit file size to a configurable size (in kilobytes). - Configurable Regular Expression pattern filters to allow fine tuning of the log messages to show. - Add option to disable loggers in configuration file. - Add organization to event logging, categorizing by the name of the event the log message pertains too.
Phase out support of environment.py, as the project root is added to pythonpath by default in pycharm.
Add code to Engine class to keep track of a shared instance of the Engine class, and make all persistent variables class-level, so they are shared across instances.

Initial support for a widget display system.
Added flag around Engine event loop to ensure only one instance is running at a time.
Added documentation.

Added basic documentation for display module.
Added basic documentation for engine module, and changed log messages from debug level to info level.
Added basic documentation for environment module.
Start of implementation for PGEWidget and Layouts.

Fixed painting to include the pygame.display.flip() necessary to show all changes to the screen after a paint.
Updated .gitignore
